job.title: AI/ML - Backend Software Engineer, Speech & Language Technologies
job.description: brstrongSummarybrstrong brThe AIML  Machine Translation team is looking for exceptional Software Engineers passionate about delighting customers experience and pushing the envelope on Machine Learning Artificial Intelligence Embedded and Distributed Computingbrbr brstrongKey Qualificationsbrstrong brIndepth development experience with CCbrbrExperience in objectoriented software design and programmingbrbrExperience in implementing services scalable to millions of usersbrbrFamiliarity with networking distributed systems and multithreaded programmingbrbrKnowledge of machine learning techniques is a plusbrbrPassionate about creating phenomenal productsbrbr brstrongDescriptionbrstrong brYou will be a part of a team that is responsible for a wide variety of language technologies related research and development activities You will primarily be responsible for developing services that deliver our applications and technologies to millions of peoplebrbrbrTo succeed in this role you are a strong programmer and a creative problem solver who enjoys learning new thingsbrbrbrYou will possess strong skills in objectoriented software design and programming You are passionate about developing new features maintaining existing code fixing bugs and contributing to overall system design You are a great teammate who thrives in a dynamic environment with rapidly changing prioritiesbrbr brstrongEducation amp Experiencebrstrong brBS or MS in Computer Science or related field with 4 years of industrial working experiencebrbr brRole Number 200200063brbr
